description: A Bombarde mounted en chamade. For more information, see Chamade.
examplesDescription: All known examples are listed below.

examples.name: Bombarde-en-Chamade 16', Antiphonal Recit; Broadway Baptist Church, Fort Worth, Texas, USA; Casavant 1996.
